text: The Thiotrichales are an order of Proteobacteria, including Thiomargarita namibiensis, the largest known bacterium.George M. Garrity: Bergey's Manual of Systematic Bacteriology. 2. Auflage. Springer, New York, 2005, Volume 2: The Proteobacteria, Part B: The Gammaproteobacteria They also include certain pathogens, such as Francisella tularensis which causes tularemia (rabbit fever). ==References== Category:Gammaproteobacteria
title: Thiotrichales
